org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic

Class LCNParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.LCNParser

  • public class LCNParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses the LCN-Short form, which is being used by the user in the item declarations, to actual PCHK conform messages.
    Parses input from the LCN (PCK) bus.
    Parses LCNInputModule into special requests.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek
